text: Countdown to Nowhere is the fourth full-length studio album from Allister, a pop punk band from Chicago, Illinois, released in Japan on June 16, 2010 and in the U.S. on October 5, 2010. It was the band's first full-length album released in five years, and their first album released after the conclusion of their three-year hiatus. A music video for the song "Free" was released on April 23, 2010. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Allister albums Category:Universal Music Japan albums
title: Countdown to Nowhere
